EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/iss-knowtify-and-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming webinar Make Better Decisions, Faster with ISS Knowtify and Pivotal Cloud Foundry.
Date: Tuesday, November 15, 2016 {{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
Time: 9:00am PST / 12:00pm EST
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1290339/9BDD2842A06CFC83CDA4CCF2F6455AAE]]>
Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming via your computer speakers.
We look forward to you joining us.
The Pivotal Team
